headline.main: BROOKLYN NEWS.; King's County Board of Supervisors.

docs.lead_paragraph: An adjourned meeting of this Board was held last evening, President CROWELL in the Chair. A communication was received from the keeper of the Penitentiary, notifying the Board that nine prisoners made their escape on Monday, about noon, and giving the names of the Deputy-keepers on duty at that time.

docs.snippet: Mr. JOHNSON, counsel for the claimants, yesterday summoned up before the Commissioners, and replied at length to the positions of the opposing counsel.

headline.main: Staten Island Damages.; SUMMING UP BY THE COUNSEL FOR CLAIMANTS.
